title: [Lead Quality] Customer is receiving leads with low order quantities (20-50 sets) and needs leads with a minimum of 500 sets, worth at least 1.5 lakh. (1 reports)
description:

top_problems.problem: Customer is receiving leads with low order quantities (20-50 sets) and needs leads with a minimum of 500 sets, worth at least 1.5 lakh.

examples: Investigate lead quality in the cashew nut category and provide resources or training to the seller on building trust with potential buyers (e.g., leveraging TrustSEAL).
Adjust the customer's lead filters to prioritize leads with higher order quantities. Ensure the category-city targeting is correctly configured to attract relevant buyers.
